thing-type.label: Aeon Labs HEM-G2
thing-type.description:
Home Energy Meter G2

Device Overview

Brief description here

Inclusion and Exclusion

To include the device into the network...

To exclude the device from the network...

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Reverse clamping
parameter.description: If the reverse clamping pliers, negative power is detected.

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Selective Reporting
parameter.description: Enable selective reporting only when power change reaches a certain threshold or percentage set in 4-11 below. This is used to reduce network traffic. (Bit 0: Whole HEM , Bit 1:Clamp 1, Bit 2:Clamp 2, Bit 3:Clamp 3)

parameter.name: config_4_2
parameter.label: 4: Current Threshold - Whole HEM
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Whole HEM). (Valid values 0-60000)

parameter.name: config_5_2
parameter.label: 5: Current Threshold - Clamp 1
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 1). (Valid values 0-60000)

parameter.name: config_6_2
parameter.label: 6: Current Threshold - Clamp 2
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 2). (Valid values 0-60000)

parameter.name: config_7_2
parameter.label: 7: Current Threshold - Clamp 3
parameter.description: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 3). (Valid values 0-60000)

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Percent Change - Whole HEM
parameter.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Whole HEM). (Valid values 0-100)

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: Percent Change - Clamp 1
parameter.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 1). (Valid values 0-100)

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Percent Change - Clamp 2
parameter.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 2). (Valid values 0-100)

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: Percent Change - Clamp 3
parameter.description: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Clamp 3). (Valid values 0-100)

parameter.name: config_101_4
parameter.label: 101: Which reports need to send automatically for group 1
parameter.description: 1 -> Battery Report 2 -> MultiSensor Report for the whole device 4 -> Meter Report for Watt for the whole device 8 -> Meter Report for kWh for the whole device 256 -> Meter Report for Watt for clamp 1 512 -> Meter Report for Watt for clamp 2 1024 -> Meter Report for Watt for clamp 3 2048 -> Meter Report for kWh for clamp 1 4096 -> Meter Report for Watt for clamp 2 8192 -> Meter Report for kWh for clamp 3

parameter.name: config_102_4
parameter.label: 102: Which reports need to send automatically for group 2
parameter.description: 1 -> Battery Report 2 -> MultiSensor Report for the whole device 4 -> Meter Report for Watt for the whole device 8 -> Meter Report for kWh for the whole device 256 -> Meter Report for Watt for clamp 1 512 -> Meter Report for Watt for clamp 2 1024 -> Meter Report for Watt for clamp 3 2048 -> Meter Report for kWh for clamp 1 4096 -> Meter Report for Watt for clamp 2 8192 -> Meter Report for kWh for clamp 3

parameter.name: config_103_4
parameter.label: 103: Which reports need to send automatically for group 3
parameter.description: 1 -> Battery Report 2 -> MultiSensor Report for the whole device 4 -> Meter Report for Watt for the whole device 8 -> Meter Report for kWh for the whole device 256 -> Meter Report for Watt for clamp 1 512 -> Meter Report for Watt for clamp 2 1024 -> Meter Report for Watt for clamp 3 2048 -> Meter Report for kWh for clamp 1 4096 -> Meter Report for Watt for clamp 2 8192 -> Meter Report for kWh for clamp 3

parameter.label: 111: Interval to send out reports of group 1

parameter.label: 112: Interval to send out reports of group 2

parameter.name: wakeup_interval
parameter.label: Wakeup Period
parameter.description: Set the wakeup period in seconds

parameter.name: wakeup_node
parameter.label: Wakeup Node
parameter.description: The node to which wakeup messages will be sent
